resources.string: Amartya Sen was awarded the Nobel prize for his contribution to Welfare Economics.
The Headquarters of the Southern Naval Command of the India Navy is located at Thiruvananthapuram.
Earth Rotation is also called annual motion of the earth?
There are 4 sessions of the Parliament each year: Spring, Summer, Autumn and Winter.
The Mahabharata is not a part of The Bhagavad Gita.
Secularism in India means: A state that supports or participates in a neutral manner in the affairs of all religious groups.
